title: Welcome To My Blog
text:
This is the first post in a Quarto blog. Welcome!

Since this post doesn‚Äôt specify an explicit image, the first image in the post will be used in the listing page of posts.

title: Post With Code
text: This is a post with executable code.

title: Home
text:
Profile Photo


I am Edoardo Filippi, a bioinformatician working in the lab of Federico Marini.
This is what I do: I analyze biological data, develop pipelines for single-cell RNA-seq, and create reproducible reports and software tools for research projects.

title: Projects
text:
Welcome! Here are some of my projects. Click the GitHub icon to see the source code.



A collection of functions to help building reports in Rmarkdown.
GitHub üîó




An interface to convert Metabolon data table objects to SingleCellExperiment objects.
GitHub üîó




An application to represent our institute in the wissenschaftsmarkt 2025 in Mainz.
GitHub üîó




A pipeline to simplify the analysis of single-cell RNA-seq data.
GitHub üîó




A Python package to automate execution of freesurfer pipelines using docker.
GitHub üîó




A Python package to simplify the processing of single-cell RNA-seq data.
GitHub üîó




A light intensity measurement tool written in Assembly language.
GitHub üîó




An IoT-based platform to manage multiple sensors.
